caption: Security Alert
description: Security Alert events report the creation, update, or closure of alerts as a result of detections and/or analytics.
name: security_alert

attacks.description: An array of attacks associated with the alert.

comment.description: Additional user supplied details for creating, updating or closing the alert.

priority.description: The priority name, as defined by priority_id enum value.

priority_id.description:
The normalized priority.

Priority identifies the relative importance of the alert. It is a measurement of urgency.

rule_id.description: The identifier of the rule that triggered the alert

rule_name.description: The name of the rule that triggered the alert

rule_type.description: The type of rule that triggered the alert, e.g. custom-defined or built-in

user.description: The creator of the rule that triggered the alert, or the user associated with an alert update or closure.
